QuestData.Title: Gathering Together
QuestData.Description:
I haven't heard an outsider speak |L303-our tongue|l. Your |L303-grasp is a bit basic...|l
But only a friend of the clan would speak it at all!
|L303-I am Elder Mhaz. If it is safe to return home, we should set off soon. But many of us are weak with sadness of the heart--and grumbling of the stomach. I would not put you at risk gathering fresh meat, but could you gather roots for us?
We have already gathered ones that are close. I hope this comfort food will lift our spirits enough to return!|l
